remoteServer

Class ComputingMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • remoteServer.ComputingMachine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, Calculator

    public class ComputingMachine
extends java.lang.Object
implements Calculator
    This class implements the business logic of Calculator. Except for that of findRoots, I'm not in the mood for that, so it's kind of a fake method. Who cares.
